Articles.Content:
I'm firing up Twitch for some Career Mode play in 0.90. I've just completed a Duna/Ike set of contracts in my previous session, so most of this will probably be interplanetary as I fill in the last couple of tiers on the tech tree, so come on down and join the fun. Questions answered as best I can for those needing help.

http://twitch.tv/Jimorian

I'll also use this thread for future stream announcements to avoid cluttering up the board.
